comment.author: Andrew
comment.text: Respect the native lands and build around it, they are the native Americans ... we have money to give to foreign nations then we have the money to take care of our own people .

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: You're right, Democrats lied to them. So we should respect their burial grounds at least. We have the money to figure out another way. But it all begins with respect.

replies.author: Mariah
replies.text: Andrew also donate to their causes ; they are worst off than ANY minority , even Illegals and refugees! OmG! what an injustice.
